sounds.incompatability.title: Incompatability Detected
sounds.incompatability.message:
It appears that both the §lQualitySounds§r and §lSounds§r mods are installed.

§lPlease uninstall the QualitySounds mod, as the Sounds mod already includes all of its sound effects and functionalities.

Keeping both mods installed will cause conflicts with Sounds' mixins, leading to sound duplications and other potential issues and crashes.§r

§lSounds§r is fully feature-complete with everything offered by QualitySounds and even more customizable.§r

With §lSounds§r, you can modify place, fall, break, and step sounds for blocks that have been given custom sound effects, including modifying their pitch and volume, features which QualitySounds lacks.
sounds.config.title: Sounds Config
sounds.config.preview.name: Preview Sound
sounds.config.play.error.title: Failed to play sound.
sounds.config.play.error.description: An error occurred while trying to play the "%s" sound. Are you sure it's sound event ID is valid?
sounds.config.preview.error.title: Failed to Preview
sounds.config.preview.error.description: An error occurred while trying to preview the sound effect. Are you sure the sound event ID is valid?
sounds.config.tag.option.description: Any blocks within this tag will have the following sound settings applied to their block sound group.
sounds.config.dynamic.option.description:
Should the sound event that is played be dependent on the item, block, or action that is currently happening?

For items and blocks, the sound event will be determined by what type of item/block it is.
sounds.config.volume.name: Sound Volume
sounds.config.pitch.name: Sound Pitch
sounds.config.pitch.description:
The pitch of the sound.

A lower pitch gives a deeper sound, whilst a higher pitch gives a more squeakier sound.
sounds.config.event.name: Sound Event ID
sounds.config.event.description:
The sound event ID that is played when the sound is triggered.

This is a unique identifier for the sound event, and is used to play the sound in the game.
sounds.config.repeaterUse.option.descrip: A sound effect that is played when you interact with a Redstone Repeater.
sounds.config.jukeboxUse.option.descript: A sound effect that is played when you insert or remove a music disc from a Jukebox.
sounds.config.daylightDetectorUse.option: A sound effect that is played when you interact with a Daylight Detector to change it's detection mode.
sounds.config.furnaceMinecartFuel.option: A sound effect that is played when you fuel a Furnace Minecart.
sounds.config.option.description.enableE: Should the sound effect that is played when you throw an Ender Pearl be randomized and more consistent with the chorus fruit teleport sound?
sounds.config.frostWalker.option.descrip: The sound effect that plays when frost walker boots freeze water.
sounds.config.leadSnapping.option.descri: The sound effect that plays when a lead is snapped off of a mob.
sounds.config.bowPull.option.description: A sound effect that is played when you pull back a bow.
sounds.config.plantPotFill.option.descri: A sound effect that is played when you fill a flower pot with a plant.
sounds.config.cakeEat.option.description: A sound effect that is played when you eat a slice of cake. The cake may be a lie, but the sound isn't!
sounds.config.babyChickenChirp.option.de: A sound effect that is played when a baby chicken chirps.
sounds.config.wolfHowling.option.descrip: A sound effect that is played by wolves when a full moon is out... beware !
sounds.config.world.blocks.description:
Block sounds are now managed through resource packs.

For more information, consider checking out the Sounds wiki by clicking the following link below.
sounds.config.option.description.disable: This will disable all block sounds that have been modified via resource packs. This is useful if you want to use the default block sounds that come with the game.
sounds.config.option.ignoredBlocks.descr: A list of blocks that will not have any custom sound definition settings applied to them, even if they are in a tag that has sound settings applied to it.
sounds.config.option.description.ignoreE:
Should empty hotbar slots be ignored when playing sound effects?

Note: This does NOT include the hotbar drop sound effect due to the weird mojank implementation of item dropping mechanics. You should toggle the 'Ignore Empty Inventory Slots' option for that.
sounds.config.inventoryOpen.option.descr: A sound effect that is played when you open a screen that has an inventory, such as an enchanting table.
sounds.config.inventoryScroll.option.des: A sound effect that is played when you use a scrollbar in any inventory.
sounds.config.inventoryClose.option.desc: A sound effect that is played when you close a screen that has an inventory, such as an enchanting table.
sounds.config.inventoryTyping.option.des: A sound effect that is played when you type into the anvil name bar or creative inventory search bar.
sounds.config.hotbarScroll.option.descri: A sound effect that is played when you scroll through your hotbar or use the number keys to select a hotbar slot.
sounds.config.hotbarPick.option.descript: A sound effect that is played when you use the 'Pick Block' action.
sounds.config.option.description.ignoreE:
Should empty inventory slots be ignored when playing sound effects?

Note: This includes the hotbar drop sound effect due to the weird mojank implementation of item dropping mechanics.
sounds.config.option.description.enableI: Should a cooldown be applied to item sounds? If enabled, the sound will only be played once within every cooldown period.
sounds.config.option.description.itemSou: The cooldown period for item sounds, in seconds.
sounds.config.itemCopy.option.descriptio: A sound effect that is played when you clone an item in your inventory.
sounds.config.itemDelete.option.descript: A sound effect that is played when you delete an item using the bin/garbage can in the creative inventory.
sounds.config.itemDrop.option.descriptio: A sound effect that is played when you drop an item from your inventory.
sounds.config.itemDrag.option.descriptio: A sound effect that is played when you drag an item across slots in your inventory.
sounds.config.itemPick.option.descriptio: A sound effect that is played when you click on an item in your inventory.
sounds.config.mentionKeywords.option.des: A list of keywords that will trigger a mention sound effect when mentioned in chat.
sounds.config.option.description.ignoreS: Should system messages be ignored in the chat when playing sound effects?
sounds.config.typing.option.description: A sound effect that is played when you type or remove characters from the chat input bar.
sounds.config.message.option.description: A sound effect that is played when you receive a message in the chat.
sounds.config.mention.option.description: A sound effect that is played when you are mentioned in a new chat message.
sounds.config.option.description.enableC: Should a cooldown be applied to chat sounds? If enabled, the sound will only be played once within every cooldown period. This does not apply to typing sounds.
sounds.config.option.description.chatSou: The cooldown period for chat sounds, in seconds. This does not apply to typing sounds.
sounds.config.option.description.ignoreS: Should status effects that have been silenced (no HUD icon) be ignored when playing sound effects?
sounds.config.positiveStatusEffectGain.o: A sound effect that is played when you gain a positive status effect.
sounds.config.positiveStatusEffectLose.o: A sound effect that is played when you lose a positive status effect.
sounds.config.negativeStatusEffectGain.o: A sound effect that is played when you gain a negative status effect.
sounds.config.negativeStatusEffectLose.o: A sound effect that is played when you lose a negative status effect.
